mentionedBy.name: BlackLine Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Leads BlackLine in G2 Fall 2025 Grid Report for Financial Close. Named to G2 2025 Best Accounting and Finance Products. Average go-live 1.7 months vs 5 months for BlackLine. Positive ROI in 11 months vs 22 months for BlackLine. Better fit for mid-market on Microsoft Dynamics and Great Plains.
